cause.description:
Visit my personal fundraising page: https://msors.mssociety.ca/Bike2007/Sponsor.aspx?PID=944681&L=2&GC=ORS and make a donation online.
Please join me in my efforts to end this disease by making a donation today.
To find out more about the RONA MS Bike Tour, please visit www.msbiketours.com.
Bring MS to an end. Donate today.
Sincerely, Jelena Polomcic
1. Over 90% of MS Society revenue is generated through fundraising.
2. There is a lot of research taking place around the world that is looking to improve the life of people with MS and eliminate the disease for future generations.
3. No one need face MS alone.
cause.name: Biking for Multiple Sclerosis
